column1: Are you having a Day of the Dead party, or teaching your students about the Day of the Dead tradition? These festive
column4:
>and colorful Day of the Dead Masks are a great way to show off and learn about a unique Mexican celebration. Each package includes four masks of different Day of the Dead designs.

The masks are printed on a cardstock material with an elastic band attached to hold the mask in place. The eye holes are cut out so you can see through the mask and your mouth is unobstructed under the mask. Check out all of our Day of the Dead decorations including the colorful Day of the Dead tissue garland.

column1:
• Each package includes four (4) masks
  • Masks measure 12 inches
  • Each mask is printed on cardstock with elastic attached
  • This set of four cardstock masks is designed to be worn, but you can also use them as Day of the Dead cutouts to decorate your room.
